name: Super-Cute Felt - Craft Book
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January Buy a signed copy of my first book, Super-Cute Felt! Leave me a note during Paypal checkout or send me a message via my contact form letting me know who you'd like it dedicated to or if you'd like a special inscription. Super-Cute Felt: 35 step-by step projects to make and give, published by CICO Books. Paperback, 128 pages, 200 colour photos and illustrations. The book contains: - projects for all skill levels and a techniques section with lots of tips on working with felt - 35 felt projects, divided into four chapters: accessories, gifts, homewares and celebrations - detailed instructions, step-by-step illustrations and pattern templates for each project - a list of suppliers for sourcing felt & other materials All the designs featured in this book are for personal use only.

name: Super-Cute Felt Animals - Craft Book
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January Buy a signed copy of my second book, Super-Cute Felt Animals! Leave me a note during Paypal checkout or send me a message via my contact form letting me know who you'd like it dedicated to or if you'd like a special inscription. Super-Cute Felt Animals : 35 delightfully dainty projects to stitch, published by CICO Books. Paperback, 128 pages, 200 colour photos and artworks. The book contains: - 35 felt projects, divided into six chapters: In the Woods, On Safari, Under the Sea, On the Farm, In the Garden and At Home - projects for all skill levels - detailed instructions, step-by-step illustrations and full size pattern templates for each project - a techniques section with lots of tips on working with felt and adapting the designs to make gifts like brooches and mobiles - a list of suppliers for sourcing felt & other materials All the designs featured in this book are for personal use only.

name: Wren - PDF Embroidery Pattern
description: A printable PDF embroidery pattern of a little wren. This listing is for a digital pattern, NOT for the finished item. Due to the digital nature of this product, I am unable to issue refunds. Please read this listing carefully and ask any questions you have *before* you buy. Thanks! The PDF includes the full pattern, a version without the text (so you can add your own) and the wren on its own (without the ribbon), plus reversed versions. Transfer instructions & full stitch guides are not included, but I have listed the the DMC thread colours I used to stitch the design. If printed at full size, the pattern is approx 4 1/2 inches (11.5 cm) high. The photos show it in a 6 inch embroidery hoop. The PDF is designed to be printed on A4 paper. It includes 1 cover page, 1 page with colour info, 3 pattern pages and a 1 page guide to the terms of use of this pattern (see below). This pattern was originally published in &Stitches ezine. The motto "unto little things is a certain grace annexed" is from a 16th Century book of proverbs. After purchasing this PDF, you may: * Stitch and sell as many wrens as you wish as long as they are handsewn by you alone (no mass manufacturing) and you credit me as the designer & include my shop link in your listings or on your tags if you're selling at a craft fair * Teach a class or workshop using this pattern, and print multiple copies for use as teaching aids in the class only. You may NOT: * Sell copies of this pattern in any form * Share copies of this pattern with your friends, give copies to your students, or post it online * Use my photos to sell your work or promote your sewing classes The file will be emailed to you within 48 hours of cleared payment (usually much sooner). Your file will be sent to the address provided during Paypal checkout - if you want me to use another email address, please leave me a note during the checkout process. If you don't receive the file please check your spam folder. If the file has definitely not arrived or you have any other problems with the pattern, please get in touch with me as soon as possible.

name: Angel - PDF Embroidery Pattern
description: A printable PDF embroidery pattern of a sweet angel! A lovely motif to stitch for Christmas. This listing is for a digital pattern, NOT for the finished item. Due to the digital nature of this product, I am unable to issue refunds. Please read this listing carefully and ask any questions you have *before* you buy. Thanks! The photos show it in a 5inch embroidery hoop. The PDF is designed to be printed on A4 paper. It includes 1 cover page, 1 pattern page, and a 1 page guide to the terms of use of this pattern (see below). Buy this embroidery pattern together with the felt angel ornament tutorial and save! After purchasing this PDF, you may: * Stitch and sell as many angels as you wish as long as they are handsewn by you alone (no mass manufacturing) and you credit me as the designer & include my shop link in your listings or on your tags if you're selling at a craft fair * Teach a class or workshop using this pattern, and print multiple copies for use as teaching aids in the class only. name: Vintage Felt Baubles - PDF Sewing Pattern
description: A printable PDF pattern for sewing a set of felt ornaments inspired by vintage glass baubles! This listing is for a digital pattern, NOT for the finished item. Due to the digital nature of this product, I am unable to issue refunds. Please read this listing carefully and ask any questions you have *before* you buy. Thanks! This pattern is a commercial-use version of the free (non-commercial use) felt bauble pattern available on my blog. * If sewn at full size, the teardrop shaped bauble will be approx 3 inches (7.5cms) high. * Stitches involved: whip stitch, running stitch, backstitch and single straight stitches * Materials required: felt, sewing thread, embroidery thread/floss, narrow ribbon, ric rac * Tools required: sewing needle, pins, sewing scissors and a large needle for sewing the embroidery thread/floss The PDF is designed to be printed on A4 paper. It includes 1 cover page, 2 pages of step by step instructions with colour photos, 1 page of templates and a 1 page guide to the terms of use of this pattern (see below). Instructions on how to do the stitches needed for this pattern are not included. After purchasing this PDF, you may: * Sell as many baubles sewn from it as you wish as long as they are handmade by you alone (no mass manufacturing) and you credit me as the designer & include my shop link in your online listings or on your tags if you're selling at a craft fair. * Teach a class or workshop using this pattern, and print multiple copies for use as teaching aids in the class only. name: Primrose Trio Brooch
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January A large felt flower brooch featuring a trio of sweet yellow primroses. Now on sale! Was 12, now just 3. Three soft yellow felt primroses, and three spring green leaves, on a dark green felt background. * 100% hand stitched and cut by hand from my own original pattern * Your flower brooch may vary slightly from the one pictured due to its handmade nature

name: Blue Teapot Rosette Brooch
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January A fun felt brooch for champion tea drinkers! A rosette made from light blue and royal blue felt, with a blue teapot button. The brooch is approx 3 1/4 inches (9cms) high and 2 1/4 inches (6cms) wide. * 100% hand stitched, cut by hand from my own original pattern * Your teapot brooch may vary slightly from the one pictured due to its handmade nature

name: Swan Mask
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January Disguise yourself as a swan with this fun bird mask! Now on sale! Was 12, now just 2.50. A fun accessory for any night out, or an instant costume for fancy dress parties or masked balls. This mask has been handmade from felt, with a band of white elastic. The main body of the mask measures approx 6 1/2 inches (16cms) across. One size fits most adults. Great for the young at heart! * 100% hand stitched, cut by hand from my own original pattern * Your swan mask may vary slightly from the one pictured due to its handmade nature

name: Felt flower necklace, dusky pink
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January A statement bib or collar necklace featuring three pink felt flowers and lots of sparkly purple seed beads. The flowers have been handmade from gorgeous 100% wool felt. They are sewn onto a backing of white acrylic felt. The necklace is approx 7 1/2 inches (19cm) wide, and fastened with two pieces of white satin ribbon each measuring over 13 inches (34cm). * You will receive the exact necklace pictured - this is a one of a kind piece. * 100% hand stitched and cut by hand from my own original pattern * Please note that all my designs ship from the UK

name: 10m Pink Ribbon - Destash
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January I'm clearing out some stuff from my craft supplies stash! 10 metres of single satin pink ribbon (6mm wide). Great for crafting or gift wrapping.

A bottle of thinner to be used with the Pebeo Vitrea 160 range of glass paint. Each bottle = 45ml of thinner. You will receive ONE bottle. (Shipping within the UK only)

name: 5m Black or White Ribbon, 10mm wide - Destash
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January I'm clearing out some stuff from my craft supplies stash! 5 metres of double satin ribbon, measuring 10mm wide. Available in black (pictured) or white (not pictured).

name: 12 x Cameo Buttons - Destash

name: 100 Grip Seal Bags - Destash
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January I'm clearing out some stuff from my craft supplies stash! Approx. 100 clear, resealable plastic bags. These are great for packaging small items like brooches for sale, but I also use them to store craft supplies like ribbons and buttons as well as small paper pattern pieces and in progress small projects. Each bag measures approx 8.8 x 11.5 cm (3.5 x 4.4 inches) (excluding the section above the seal).

name: 25m White Round Hat Elastic - Destash
description: I'm taking a break for the holidays! This item will ship the week beginning 6th January I'm clearing out some stuff from my craft supplies stash! 25 metres of round white hat elastic (1.5mm in diameter) - the black elastic has now sold out. Great for hats (obviously!) but I've also used this for making headbands and necklaces, and it's the perfect elastic for making the felt moustaches in this tutorial: http://bugsandfishes.blogspot.com/2012/06/free-tutorial-felt-moustaches.html
